questionTitle: Another word for "baggage" is ...........
"To make up one's mind" means to ............
"Oh, something's wrong with my phone." "Call the ................"
do the buses run? "Every twenty minutes"
Their father has just given them his car, so they needn't ............. a new car.
He looks tired of carrying that case, .............?
You've heard she will travel around the world, ...........?
What does he do to .............. his living?
You may go out for a drink .............. the intervals.
present the price of apples is 6,000 VND a pound.
He was only nine, but he ate ............. his brother did.
Our plane will arrive at the airport ....... noon.
The letter C is ................. B and D.
It takes five minutes ........... to the post office.
He has bought .............. a nice dress.
Where did he go when we ..........?
It's ............. cold for us to go out now.
My house is a few yards ................ the bus-stop.
The food was ........... good that we ate all of it.
Let's listen to .................. music on the radio.
Who can make you ...........?
